00017 class CascadeServiceFilters : public ServiceFilter,      public SimpleList<ServiceFilter*>
00018 {
00019 public:
00020 
00021         typedef enum CascadeServiceFiltersType { IsAND, IsOR }; 
00022 
00023         CascadeServiceFilters(CascadeServiceFiltersType CreationType = IsAND);
00024         virtual ~CascadeServiceFilters();
00025 
00026 // Abstracted function
00027         virtual bool IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP);
00028         virtual ServiceFilter * Duplicate();
00029 
00030         void Empty();
00031 
00032 private:
00033         CascadeServiceFiltersType Type;
00034 };

00156 void ServiceFilterList::Empty()
00157 {
00158         ServiceFilter * pFilter;
00159 
00160         for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00161         {
00162                 pFilter = GetCurrent();
00163                 if ( pFilter != NULL )
00164                 {
00165                         // Delete the current filter
00166                         delete pFilter;
00167                 }
00168                 RemoveCurrent();
00169         }
00170 }

00174         Type = CreationType;
00175 }

00177 CascadeServiceFilters::~CascadeServiceFilters()
00178 {
00179         Empty();
00180 }
00181 
00182 void CascadeServiceFilters::Empty()
00183 {
00184         for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00185         {
00186                 delete GetCurrent();
00187                 RemoveCurrent();
00188         }
00189 }
00190 
00191 bool CascadeServiceFilters::IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP)
00192 {
00193         if ( Type == IsAND )
00194         {
00195                 // IsAND : at first false, the final answer is false
00196                 for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00197                 {
00198                         if ( GetCurrent()->IsAGoodService(SP) == false )
00199                         {
00200                                 return false;
00201                         }
00202                 }
00203                 return true;
00204         }
00205         else
00206         {
00207                 // IsOr : at first true, the final answer is true
00208                 for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00209                 {
00210                         if ( GetCurrent()->IsAGoodService(SP) == true )
00211                         {
00212                                 return true;
00213                         }
00214                 }
00215                 return false;
00216         }
00217 }
00218 
00219 ServiceFilter * CascadeServiceFilters::Duplicate()
00220 {
00221         // Create a copy
00222         CascadeServiceFilters * Copy = new CascadeServiceFilters();
00223         if ( Copy == NULL )
00224         {
00225                 return NULL;
00226         }
00227 
00228         // Duplicate all child into the copy
00229         for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00230         {
00231                 Copy->Add( GetCurrent()->Duplicate() );
00232         }
00233 
00234         // Return the copy
00235         return Copy;
00236 }

00250 bool ServiceNameIs::IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP)
00251 {
00252         SimpleString ServiceName;
00253         try
00254         {
00255                 ServiceName = SP.GetName();
00256                 if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00257                 {
00258                         return false;
00259                 }
00260 
00261                 if ( OnlyPrefix )
00262                 {
00263                         if ( CaseInsensitive )
00264                         {
00265                                 return (strncasecmp(Name.GetStr(), ServiceName.GetStr(), Name.GetLength()) == 0);
00266                         }
00267                         return (strncmp(Name.GetStr(), ServiceName.GetStr(), Name.GetLength()) == 0); 
00268                 }
00269                 else
00270                 {
00271                         if ( CaseInsensitive )
00272                         {
00273                                 return (strcasecmp(Name.GetStr(), ServiceName.GetStr()) == 0);
00274                         }
00275                         return (Name == ServiceName);
00276                 }
00277         }
00278         catch (SimpleException& e)
00279         {
00280                 OmiscidError( "ServiceNameIs::IsAGoodService: %s (%d).\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00281         }
00282         return false;
00283 }
00284 
00285 ServiceFilter * ServiceNameIs::Duplicate()
00286 {
00287         return new ServiceNameIs( Name, CaseInsensitive, OnlyPrefix );
00288 }

00300 bool ServiceOwnerIs::IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP)
00301 {
00302         SimpleString ServiceOwner;
00303         ServiceOwner = SP.GetVariableValue( OwnerString );
00304         if ( ServiceOwner.IsEmpty() )
00305         {
00306                 return false;
00307         }
00308 
00309         if ( CaseInsensitive )
00310         {
00311                 return (strcasecmp(Owner.GetStr(), ServiceOwner.GetStr()) == 0);
00312         }
00313         return (Owner == ServiceOwner);
00314 }

00359 bool ServiceHasVariable::IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP)
00360 {
00361         if ( SP.HasVariable(VariableName) == false )
00362                 return false;
00363 
00364         // We have the variable, shall we compare with value ?
00365         if ( CheckValue )
00366         {
00367                 SimpleString RemoteValue = SP.GetVariableValue( VariableName );
00368 
00369                 if ( VariableValue == RemoteValue )
00370                 {
00371                         return true;
00372                 }
00373                 return false;
00374         }
00375         return true;
00376 }

00381 }

00399         return true;

00433 ServiceFilter * Omiscid::PeerIdIs(unsigned int PeerId)
00434 {
00435         SimpleString VarName( PeerIdString );
00436         SimpleString VarValue;
00437         
00438         // generate PeerId string
00439         TemporaryMemoryBuffer Buffer(30);
00440         snprintf( Buffer, 30, "%8.8x", PeerId & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID );
00441         VarValue = (char*)Buffer;
00442 
00443         return new ServiceHasVariable( VarName, VarValue );
00444 }

00452 ServiceFilter * Omiscid::ClassIs( const SimpleString ClassName )
00453 {
00454         SimpleString VarName( ClassString );
00455         SimpleString LocalClassName;
00456 
00457         // If no class given, use the default class
00458         if ( ClassName.IsEmpty() )
00459         {
00460                 LocalClassName = ControlServer::DefaultServiceClassName;
00461         }
00462         else
00463         {
00464                 LocalClassName = ClassName;
00465         }
00466 
00467         return new ServiceHasVariable( VarName, LocalClassName );
00468 }

00533 ServiceFilter * Omiscid::And( ServiceFilter * First, ServiceFilter * Second,
00534                                                     ServiceFilter * Third, ServiceFilter * Fourth,
00535                                                         ServiceFilter * Fifth )
00536 {
00537         CascadeServiceFilters * pFilter = new CascadeServiceFilters( CascadeServiceFilters::IsAND );
00538         if ( pFilter == NULL )
00539         {
00540                 return NULL;
00541         }
00542 
00543         pFilter->Add( First );
00544         if ( Second )
00545         {
00546                 pFilter->Add( Second );
00547         }
00548         if ( Third )
00549         {
00550                 pFilter->Add( Third );
00551         }
00552         if ( Fourth )
00553         {
00554                 pFilter->Add( Fourth );
00555         }
00556         if ( Fifth )
00557         {
00558                 pFilter->Add( Fifth );
00559         }
00560 
00561         return pFilter;
00562 }
00563 
00570 ServiceFilter * Omiscid::Or( ServiceFilter * First, ServiceFilter * Second,
00571                                                    ServiceFilter * Third, ServiceFilter * Fourth,
00572                                                    ServiceFilter * Fifth )
00573 {
00574         CascadeServiceFilters * pFilter = new CascadeServiceFilters( CascadeServiceFilters::IsOR );
00575         if ( pFilter == NULL )
00576         {
00577                 return NULL;
00578         }
00579 
00580         pFilter->Add( First );
00581         if ( Second )
00582         {
00583                 pFilter->Add( Second );
00584         }
00585         if ( Third )
00586         {
00587                 pFilter->Add( Third );
00588         }
00589         if ( Fourth )
00590         {
00591                 pFilter->Add( Fourth );
00592         }
00593         if ( Fifth )
00594         {
00595                 pFilter->Add( Fifth );
00596         }
00597 
00598         return pFilter;
00599 }
